column5: Looking for a good source of large leeches next week...spot we usually get has "variety"...which means 99% small and the other 1% smaller. Does anyone have a good source? Thanks, Craig
We've had good luck at Lac Seul Outposts in Sioux Lookout. 800-567-4775. They had good variety with most be average and above average in size. Give them a call.
